name: Slackin
description: Let people invite themselves to your Slack

SLACK_API_TOKEN.description: A Slack API token (find it on https://api.slack.com/web)

SLACK_CHANNELS.description: Comma-separated list of single guest channels to invite them to (leave blank for a normal, all-channel invite). In order to make this work, you have to have a paid account. You'll only be able to invite as many people as your number of paying members times 5.

MAILCHIMP_API_KEY.description: A Mailchimp API key (find it on https://DC.YOURMAILCHIMPADMINACCOUNT.com/account/api/)

MAILCHIMP_LIST_ID.description: A Mailchimp list ID (find it in the settings of your Mailchimp list)
